form-types.description: Mapping for eForms schema documents root element name and namespace

mapping.ted-label: No tenders or no suitable tenders / requests to participate in response to: open procedure

mapping.ted-label: No tenders or no suitable tenders / requests to participate in response to: restricted procedure
mapping.eforms-label: Only irregular or unacceptable tenders were received in response to a previous notice. All and only those tenderers of the previous procedure which have satisfied the selection criteria, have not fulfilled the exclusion grounds and have satisfied formal requirements, were included in the negotiations

mapping.ted-label: The products involved are manufactured purely for the purpose of research, experiment, study or development under the conditions stated in the Directive
mapping.eforms-label: Purpose of the contract is purely research, experiment, study or development under the conditions stated in the Directive

mapping.ted-label: The works, supplies or services can be provided only by a particular economic operator for the following reason: absence of competition for technical reasons

mapping.ted-label: The works or services can be provided only by a particular economic operator for the following reason: procurement or concession aiming at the creation or acquisition of a unique work of art or artistic performance
mapping.eforms-label: The contract can be provided only by a particular economic operator because of creation or acquisition of a unique work of art or artistic

mapping.ted-label: The works, supplies or services can be provided only by a particular economic operator for the following reason: protection of exclusive rights, including intellectual property rights

The works or services can be provided only by a particular economic operator for the following reason: protection of intellectual property rights and exclusive rights other than those defined in point (10) of Article 5 of the Directive
mapping.eforms-label: The contract can be provided only by a particular economic operator because of exclusive rights, including intellectual property rights

mapping.eforms-label: Extreme urgency brought about by events unforeseeable for the buyer

mapping.eforms-label: Need for additional works or services by the original contractor

mapping.ted-label: New works / services, constituting a repetition of existing works / services and ordered in accordance with the strict conditions stated in the Directive
mapping.eforms-label: New works or services, constituting a repetition of existing works or services and ordered in accordance with the strict conditions stated in the Directive

mapping.ted-label: The procurement falls outside the scope of application of the Directive
mapping.eforms-label: Contracts with estimated value below the procurement thresholds

mapping.ted-label: All tenders submitted in reply to a restricted procedure, negotiated procedure with prior publication of a contract notice or competitive dialogue were irregular or unacceptable. Only those tenderers were included in the negotiations which have satisfied the qualitative selection criteria

All and only those tenderers of the previous procedure which have satisfied the selection criteria, have not fulfilled the exclusion grounds and have satisfied formal requirements, were included in the negotiations

mapping.eforms-label: No suitable tenders, requests to participate, or applications were received in response to a previous notice
